newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: RESEARCH ALERT - ST E&E is "long term buy".
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - ST E&E is "long term buy".

text.p: ST Electronic & Engineering Ltd (ST E&E) was rated a long term buy by Fraser Securities Pte Ltd on Tuesday after revealing 1996 net profits above expectations.
"Net profit increased 44.5 percent to Singapore $7.3 million, slightly above the consensus estimate. We are recommending a long term buy," a Fraser note to clients said.
Analysts had been expecting profits of S$7.1 million.
A 15.8 percent increase in ST E&E's forward order book at December 31, 1996 against the previous year's 6.7 percent rise was a positive sign, the note said.
"At current levels, the shares are trading at attractive values. Investors should, however, take note that ST E&E's shares are rather illiquid," it added.
ST E&E shares were almost unchanged at Tuesday's lunchtime stock market break, rising S$0.01 to S$1.36.
